code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import SideNav from'./Sidenav';import EducationItem from'./Education-item';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Education=()=>{const[index,setCurrentEducation]=useState(0);const educationData=[{institution:"Katholieke Universiteit, Leuven",degree:"International Scholar",courses:["Master's thesis at IMEC, Belgium"],thesis:{text:"Master's Thesis",link:"#"},date:"March, 2023 - July, 2023"},{institution:'Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata',degree:'M.Tech at Computer Science',courses:['Design Analysis of Algorithms','Computer Networks','Combinatorial Geometry','Machine Learning','Information Retrieval','Formal Methods'],thesis:{text:"Master's Thesis",link:"#"},date:"Oct, 2021 - July, 2023"},{institution:'Jadavpur University, Kolkata',degree:'B.E in Electrical Engineering',courses:['Electronics','Control Systems','Communications','High Voltage Engineering','Signals and Systems'],thesis:{text:"Bachelor's Thesis",link:"#"},date:"July, 2016 - July, 2020"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container m-5 d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SideNav,{data:educationData,_setCurrentEducation:setCurrentEducation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EducationItem,{data:educationData[index]})]});};export default Education;
